about_the_game: Inspired by everyone’s favorite savory snack, the Call of Duty®: Black Ops II Bacon MP Personalization Pack comes loaded with a bacon-wrapped weapon skin, three uniquely-shaped reticles, and an all-new themed Calling Card by which your enemies can remember you. (NOTICE: Reticles will only be available for ACOG, EOTech and Red Dot scopes.)
detailed_description: Inspired by everyone’s favorite savory snack, the Call of Duty®: Black Ops II Bacon MP Personalization Pack comes loaded with a bacon-wrapped weapon skin, three uniquely-shaped reticles, and an all-new themed Calling Card by which your enemies can remember you. (NOTICE: Reticles will only be available for ACOG, EOTech and Red Dot scopes.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows® XP SP3/Windows Vista®/Windows® 7/ Windows® 8
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo E4400 @ 2.00 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 4000+ @ 2.0 GHz processor or better
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:AMD Radeon HD 4670 512MB or Nvidia Geforce 8800 GT 512MB or better
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:9 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX® 9.0C or later
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
